TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: See what our users have to say about finding the latest products
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: With this app, I'm always in the know about the hottest new releases. It's become my go-to for staying ahead of the curve.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a busy professional, I don't have time to scour the internet for new products. This app does all the hard work for me and surfaces the best new finds.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Whether it's the latest tech gadget or a cool new kitchen tool, this app never disappoints in helping me discover innovative products.

CTA_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our app that curates the latest and greatest product innovations from around the globe. Explore new ideas, designs, and technologies that are shaping the future.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions about Product Finder
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the Product Finder app work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms to scour the internet for the latest product releases across various categories. It compiles these finds into a personalized feed tailored to your interests.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What kinds of products can I discover?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: You can find new products ranging from tech gadgets and appliances to fashion, beauty, home goods, and more. The app covers a wide variety of consumer product categories.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How do I customize my product feed?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: When you first use the app, you'll be prompted to select categories and brands you're interested in. You can update these preferences anytime to further personalize your feed.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is the app free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, the Product Finder app is completely free to download and use. We don't charge any fees or subscriptions.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Explore cutting-edge innovations from around the world.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about finding exciting new products
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the app help me find new products?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms to analyze your preferences and interests, and then suggests new and trending products tailored just for you.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: What kinds of products can I find?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: You can discover products across a wide range of categories including electronics, fashion, home goods, beauty, and more. We constantly update our inventory with the latest releases.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, the app is completely free to download and use. We make money through affiliate partnerships with brands and retailers.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How do I get personalized recommendations?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Simply create an account and provide some basic information about your interests and preferences. Our algorithms will then start learning your tastes to provide tailored suggestions.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I buy products directly through the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Not at the moment. The app will provide links to purchase products from the respective brand or retailer's website.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Stay Ahead of the Curve with Our Innovative App
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve by exploring the latest and greatest products across various categories, handpicked by our team of experts.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Our algorithm learns your preferences and suggests products tailored to your unique interests and needs, ensuring you never miss out on something extraordinary.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Get early access to sneak peeks, prototypes, and beta versions of highly anticipated products before they hit the market.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Stay on top of the hottest trends and emerging markets with our comprehensive analysis of product data and consumer behavior.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Make informed decisions with in-depth reviews from industry professionals, providing unbiased insights into product quality, performance, and value.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Connect with a vibrant community of product enthusiasts, share your discoveries, and gain valuable insights from like-minded individuals.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Discover the latest innovations and cutting-edge products with ease.
